txt.en: 'Khirgi had many scouts under his command. Still, they watch our every move. Kill them and we will be done with this pest.'\n\nYou decide to defeat the guards to earn Khirgi's favour.
'They are dead? Good! You might be useful after all! Ahaha!'
Khirgi's Scouts can be found around Fushaum Bal.\n\nYou should defeat any men scouting around Fushaum Bal.
Mâlatuk can be found at Fushaum Bal.\n\nYou should talk to Mâlatuk.
The encampment of Fushaum Bal is a lawless home to evil men once under the command of Sauron.
